enchantment.extra_enchantments.lifesteal: Heals the user after killing a hostile or neutral mob based on the maximum amount of health it had
enchantment.extra_enchantments.illagers_: Attacks deal more damage to Illagers
enchantment.extra_enchantments.levitatio: Arrows shot from the crossbow make mobs go up in the air for a brief period of time
enchantment.extra_enchantments.freezing_: Freezes mobs for a brief period of time
enchantment.extra_enchantments.burning_t: Has a chance of setting on fire any mob that hits you
enchantment.extra_enchantments.freezing_: Has a chance of freezing any mob that hits you
enchantment.extra_enchantments.spectral_: Highlights any mob that hits you for a brief period of time and makes you invulnerable to the dark
enchantment.extra_enchantments.slowness_: Greatly decreases movement and mining speed
enchantment.extra_enchantments.undead_cu: Sunlight sets the user on fire
enchantment.extra_enchantments.electrifi: Reduces the amount of damage received by lightning and has a chance of striking a mob with lightning if they hit you or you hit them during a thunderstorm
enchantment.extra_enchantments.frenzy.de: Small chance of getting a strength and speed boost after killing a hostile or neutral mob
enchantment.extra_enchantments.zeus_curs: If a mob hits you while its raining, you will be struck by lightning
enchantment.extra_enchantments.blindness: Applies blindness when wearing the cursed item
enchantment.extra_enchantments.withering: Applies wither for 15 seconds after getting hit
enchantment.extra_enchantments.nausea_cu: Applies nausea when wearing the cursed item
enchantment.extra_enchantments.incompati: Makes the cursed item incompatible with all enchantments
enchantment.extra_enchantments.electrify: Every arrow shot from a bow during a thunderstorm has a small chance of electrifying the target
enchantment.extra_enchantments.resonatin: Every arrow shot from a bow has a chance to deal more damage based on the number of hearts the user has
enchantment.extra_enchantments.shadow_sh: If you kill a mob at night with an arrow shot from a bow, there's a small chance you'll become invisible and invincible for 10 seconds
enchantment.extra_enchantments.incandesc: Every arrow shot from the crossbow sets mobs on fire
enchantment.extra_enchantments.enigma_re: Chance to deal more damage based on the number of hearts the user has
enchantment.extra_enchantments.target_lo: Shooting a target multiple times with a crossbow will slowly ramp its damage up. Hitting a different target resets the damage
enchantment.extra_enchantments.superchar: Arrows shot from the crossbow deal more damage and have a greater knockback effect
enchantment.extra_enchantments.guarding_: Neutral or hostile mob kills grant you resistance for a brief period of time
enchantment.extra_enchantments.pain_cycl: Attacking neutral or hostile mobs drains your life to grant one stack of pain. At 3 stacks, your pain is channeled into your next attack
enchantment.extra_enchantments.fisherman: Attacks deal more damage to aquatic mobs
enchantment.extra_enchantments.hellwalke: Allows you to walk on lava
enchantment.extra_enchantments.reach.des: Extends how far you can reach and hit with a sword or tool
enchantment.extra_enchantments.swiftness: Increases the enchanted item's attack speed
enchantment.extra_enchantments.attrition: Decreases the enchanted item's attack speed
enchantment.extra_enchantments.soul_reap: Reduces the item's damage in exchange for a chance to heal the user with every hit on a neutral or hostile mob
enchantment.extra_enchantments.experienc: Increases the amount of experience you get when the item is in your main hand
text.config.eec-config.title: Extra Enchantments & Curses v1.7.2 for Fabric
text.config.eec-config.option.burningTho: Can be obtained in chests or by fishing
text.config.eec-config.option.overshield: Can be obtained in chests or by fishing
